body.h3: Sourced from the patient's General Practice record. This summary may not include all the information pertinent to this patient.
body.p: One or more allergies, adverse reactions, or medications have been deliberately withheld from this GP Summary.
LAURIE PIKE HEALTH CENTRE, 1 Troy Road, Horsforth, Leeds LS18 5TN

tr.td: Sensitivity to Migard 2.5mg tablets (A Menarini Pharma UK S.R.L.)
